verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Pharao kuomah va lût la, hieng ka inchiknahai hi anni lai ngeia kân entir theina dingin a siehlawhai le ama lungril ngei khawm chu ka sukngar tah a nih;

anni lai ngeia inchikna ka thawhai le, Aigupta mihai chu ieng angin am an chungah thil ka thawha ti i naupa le i tupa hrieta ngei khawm i hril theina dingin le; LALPA chu ka ni ngei ti i hriet theina dingin, ti rawh,” a tih a.

Chun, Mosie le Aron chu Pharao kuomah an va lût a, a kuomah, “Hebraihai Pathien LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: ‘Ka hmaa insiehnuoi ieng chen am i nuom naw ding a nih a? Ka rawng an bâwl theina dingin ka mihai chu infetir rawh.
Ka mihai în fetir phal naw chun, ngai rawh, i ram sûngah, zinga leh khâuhai hung ṭhuoi ka ta;

hnuoi chung po po chu a dâpin hung dâp an ta, hnuoi chu mi hmu theilo khawp hielin um a tih. Riel isuksietnaa i la chang a mahla la umhai chu fa vawng an ta, i ta dinga loa thing mâwng tinrênghai khawm chu fa vawng bawk an tih.

I inhai le i siehlaw po po inhai le Aigupta mi po po inhai chu sip vawng an ta, i pahai le i thlatuhai khawmin, hi hnuoi chunga an uma inthawk vawisûn ni chen hin chuong ang chu la hmu ngai naw bawk an tih,’ a tih,” a tih a. Chun ân her a, Pharao kuoma inthawk chun a fe suok tah a.

Chun, Pharao siehlawhai chun a kuomah, “Hi mipa hi ei ta dingin ieng chen am châng a ni ding a ni leh? An Pathien LALPA chu a rawng an bâwlpêk theina dingin mihai chu infetir ta la: Aigupta hi suksiet vawng a ni tah ti hi i la hriet naw rawp am a nih?” an tih a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu Pharao kuomah an hung ṭhuoi nâwk a, ama chun an kuomah, “Fe unla, in Pathien LALPA rawng chu va bâwl ro le; amiruokchu, a fe ding chu tu tuhai am an nih a?” a tih a.
Mosie chun, “LALPA kuoma chun ruoi kan ṭhe ding a ni sih a, kan naupanghai le kan tarhai leh, kan naupasalhai kan naunuhmeihai leh, kan bâwng ruolhai le kan berâm ruolhai leh fêng kan tih,” a tih a.
Pharao chun, “LALPA chu in kuomah um raw se; nangni le in nauhai le chu kân fetir tâk cheu leh! En ta u, thiltum ṭhanawtak in nei a ni hi.
Chuong chu ni thei naw nih, mi puitling bak va fe unla, LALPA rawng chu va bâwl ro: chu chu in nuomtak a ni sih a,” a tih a. Chun, Pharao hmaha inthawk chun hnawt hmangin an um tah a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie kuom- ah, “Khâuhai hungna dingin Aigupta ram chungah i bân phar rawh; Aigupta rama an hung a, a rama hna hring tinrêng, rielin a suksiet mahla chu an fâk vawngna dingin,” a tih a.

Chuongchun, Mosie chun Aigupta ram chunga chun a hmawl chu ân let tah a; chun, LALPA chun chu ni sûnnithlak le zânkhawvârin ram chunga chun sak thli ân hrângtir a; chun, zîngtieng a hung ni chun, sak thli chun khâuhai chu a hung lên tah a.

Khâuhai chu Aigupta ram po po chunga chun an hung a, Aigupta ram sûng po poa chun an um khup el tah a; a râpthlâk bêk a, anni hma hin anni ang hrim hin khau an la um ngai nawh a, anni hnunga khawm um ngai ta bawk nawng an tih.

A ram pumpui chu an dâp khup el sih a, ram chu ân thim khup el bawk a; rama hna hring tinrêng le, thing rahai, riel ihlahai chu an fâk ta ngei a; Aigupta ram pumpuia chun loa thlaihna, thing le thil a hring hrim a um ta dêr nawh a.
Chun Pharao chun Mosie le Aron chu inhmawtakin a ko a, “Nang le in Pathien LALPA chunga chun thil ka suksuol tah a nih.
Tuhin ka ngên che hi, ka suol hi vawikhat bak mi ngaidam nâwk phawt la, hi thina hi keimaa in- thawka a lâkhmang theina dingin LALPA chu mi hnipêk rawh,” a tih a.
Pharao kuoma inthawk chu a fe suok a, LALPA chu a hni tah a.
LALPA chun khâuhai po po chu lêna, Tuipui Sena khal lût vawngtu, thlang tieng thli hrâttak el chu ân hrângtir tah a, Aigupta ram po poa chun khâu pakhat khawm a um ta nawh a.
Nisienlakhawm, LALPA chun Pharao lungril chu a sukngar a, Israel thlahai chu ân fetir chuong nawh.
LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Aigupta ram chunga inthimna, in- maia inmaina khawp hielin inthimna a hung um theina dingin i bân phar rawh,” a tih a.
Chun, Mosie chun vân tieng a bân a phar a; chuongchun, ni thum sûng chu Aigupta ram sûng po poa chun inthim sa mup el chu a um tah a;
chu ni thum sûng chun tu- khawm an hmuna inthawkin an suok nawh a, inhmu khawm an inhmutuo thei bawk nawh; Israel thlahai po ruok chun an umnahaia chun var an nei seng a.
Chun, Pharao chun Mosie a ko a, “Fe unla, LALPA rawng chu va bâwl ro; in nauhai khawm in ruolin fe ve hai sienla, in berâm ruolhai le in bâwng ruolhai ruok chu mâksan ro,” a tih a.
Mosie ruok chun, “Kan Pathien LALPA kuoma kan inthâwi theina dingin, pumrawhmang thilinhlân dinghai le inthâwina dinghai chu kan kutah i mi pêk ding a nih.

Kan ran ruolhai khawm keini leh an fe ve ding a nih, ran tê pakhat khawm mâksan an ni ding a ni nawh a; kan Pathien LALPA rawng kan bâwlna dingin kan ṭhuoi ve ngei ding a nih; a hmun kan tlung hmakhat chu ieng hmangin am LALPA rawng chu kan bâwl ding a nih ti kan hriet si nawh a,” a tih a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pharao lungril chu LALPAIN a sukngar a, anni chu ân fetir chuong nawh a.
Pharao chun a kuomah, “Ka kuoma inthawkin fe hmang la, ka hmêl hrim hrim hung hmu nâwk ta lo dingin fîmkhur rawh, ka hmêl i hmu nâwk ni ni chun i thi ngei ding a ni sih a,” a tih a.
Mosie chun, “I ti ṭha ngawt el ie, i hmêl hmu nâwk hrim hrim ta naw ning,” a tih a.
